# RNAseq


```{r}
#| label: setup
source("rnaseq/R/DESeqDataSetFromFeatureCounts.R")
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
counts_file <- "data/RNAseq/LAURA/PHIP/counts_noclone9.txt"
design_file <- "data/RNAseq/LAURA/PHIP/design_noclone9.csv"
dds <- DESeq(DESeqDataSetFromFeatureCounts(counts_file, design_file))
colnames(dds)
resultsNames(dds)
res_phf6 <- results(dds, name = "condition_PHF6_vs_CTRL") # apeglm
res_phip <- results(dds, name = "condition_PHIP_vs_CTRL") # apeglm
vsd <- vst(dds, blind = FALSE)
plotPCA(vsd, intgroup=c("condition"))
```
